welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Woodlesford, a charming town known for its picturesque canals and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore everything this lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and usage restrictions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
